Seasoned Software Engineering Manager/Director (groundbreaking online advertising startup)
Fremont, CA

Offerpal Media is the first Managed Offer Platform for social applications, online communities, and e-commerce sites. Our turnkey platform allows developers of social applications on leading networks (such as Facebook, MySpace, Bebo, hi5, and others) to monetize their traffic through uniquely engineered offers. Concurrently, advertisers tap into Offerpals expansive network to reach more than 50 million highly engaged and targeted consumers on social networks. The platform also helps online merchants generate incremental revenue by using ad offers as an alternate payment method. With headquarters in the heart of Silicon Valley, Offerpal Media is backed by top-tier venture capitalists and features an experienced management team with deep roots in online advertising, personalization, and optimization technologies.

Role and Responsibilities

We are searching to find an Engineering Manager to guide the technical development of our Managed Offer Platform.
This seasoned manager must be a talented, highly motivated, and technically-oriented leader who will help shape a world-class Web Platform Engineering team. This engineering expert will play a crucial role in establishing our platform functionality and help in the weekly deliver of the fresh features and functionality that keeps our users engaged. Our work environment is fast-paced and based on an Agile product development methodology with user-centric design and development cycles. Offerpal Media is positioned for greater than 100% growth in 2009 and beyond  the right Engineering Manager will help us take advantage of this tremendous revenue opportunity!

Lead and develop a world-class technology team across multiple locations
Innovate and continuously improve product delivery predictability, reduce response times, and streamline development processes
Drive technical product design, influence product requirements and testing methods
Work closely with Product Management, QA, Customer Services, Support, and other development teams
Manage product delivery against conflicting priorities and resource constraints and identify and manage project risks appropriately and drive weekly release cycles

Professional Qualifications

10+ years experience in software development, including 5+ years as a hands-on manager
A deep understanding of software, systems, and computer technology
Experience building high-performance systems with 10M+ unique visitors/month, 100M+ page views/month
A history of successfully delivering world-class solutions to the enterprise
Background with web-based consumer platforms in Linux, Apache MySQL, and Java is desirable
A track record as a successful manager: building, mentoring, and coaching great teams, including the ability to motivate people, instill accountability, and achieve results

Personal Characteristics

Unwavering professional and personal commitment to delivering world-class quality products
Ability to tackle unstructured problems (technical, people, and process) with pragmatism and insight
Deep technical aptitude in Web-scale systems
Passion for building great teams, mentoring, and coaching
Exceptional communication and presentation skills

About Offerpal Media

Offerpal Media provides innovative online consumer acquisition services on a pay-for-performance basis. We enable online merchants and advertisers to grow revenue, acquire quality customers, and maximize brand reach through blogs, Websites, and social networks.

Our turn-key, full-service platform enables publishers to monetize their social applications; online merchants to generate new leads and increase conversions; and advertisers to reach their precisely targeted consumers. We have one of the largest networks of premium advertisers and more than 500 uniquely engineered offers. Offerpal Media is a fast-growing startup founded by successful serial entrepreneurs and funded by top-tier venture capital firms D.E. Shaw Investors, Interwest Capital and Northbridge Venture Partners. For more information, visit www.offerpalmedia.com.

Qualified and Interested Candidates

If this position sounds like a fit with your past experience and future interests -- and you want to be part of the excitement of a rapidly growing business -- we want to hear from you. We have a competitive compensation structure with a generous option plan and very good benefits. Please send a resume to careers@offerpal.com.

Read our blog: http://myofferpal.wordpress.com
Follow our Tweets: http://www.twitter.com/Offerpal
